kvkk.title: Privacy Notice
kvkk.description: As Fishivo, we maintain the highest level of security for your personal data in accordance with Turkish Personal Data Protection Law (KVKK) and EU data protection standards. Your data is encrypted and stored on our secure servers in Germany, and processed only for service provision purposes within legal frameworks.

identity.title: Identity Information:
identity.description: Name, surname, and email address (account creation and authentication)

security.title: Transaction Security Information:
security.description: IP address, browser information (security and fraud prevention)

usage.title: Transaction Information:
usage.description: Service usage data (service quality and improvement)

commitment.title: Our Security Commitment:
commitment.description: Your data is protected with 256-bit SSL encryption, not shared with third parties, and retained only for legally required periods. We do not use marketing cookies or tracking technologies.

cookieSettings.title: Cookie Preferences
cookieSettings.description: Manage how we use cookies to improve your experience on our website.
